scope.title: Badge
scope.description: Badges are decorative indicators used to either call attention to an item or for communicating non-actionable, supplemental information.

data.title: Badge
data.description: Badges are decorative indicators used to either call attention to an item or for communicating non-actionable, supplemental information.
